com.innolabs.spydroid

Class SplashActvity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.innolabs.spydroid.SplashActvity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SplashActvity
extends Activity
implements Serializable
    Activity used to show the Splash Screen. This is an activity which shows up first when a user opens the application.
    Version:
    1.03
    Author:
    Srikanth Rao
    See Also:
    Activity
